Museo Casa Estudio Diego Rivera y Frida Kahlo
Museo Mural Diego Rivera (Mexico City, Mexico)

originInfo.publisher: Museo Casa Estudio Diego Rivera y Frida Kahlo

physicalDescription.extent: 130, [8] p., [1] loose leaf of plates : ill., ports. (some col.) ; 31 cm.

mods.note: Consejo Nacional para la Cultura y las Artes ... [et al.]

Essays by various authors about Mexiac and his art illustrated with reproductions of the artist's murals, oil and acrylic paintings, drawings, woodcuts, linocuts, and lithographs; many portraits of the artist and others.
Original black and white relief print (woodcut?), signed by the artist, inside front pocket.

Catalog of an exhibition held at the Museo Casa Estudio Diego Rivera y Frida Kahlo, Oct. 13, 1998-Jan. 3, 1999; Museo Mural Diego Rivera, Oct. 15, 1998-Jan. 6, 1999; Pinacoteca Universitaria Alfonso Michel, Colima, Jan. 22-Mar. 14, 1999; Museo de Arte ContemporaÃÅneo Alfredo Zalce, Morelia, MichoacaÃÅn, Mar. 26-Apr. 26, 1999; Mexic-Arte Museum, Austin, Texas, May 7-June 5, 1999; Instituto Cultural Mexicano de San Antonio, Texas, Nov. 1999-Jan. 2000; South Texas Institute for the Arts, Corpus Christi, May-June 2000.
Chronology of the artist's life and work, by Patricia Salas, p. 103-122.
LC has copy no. 954 of the original relief print, dated 1998.
Includes references to books illustrated by the artist, p. 129-130.
